scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Annunciation within an architectural setting. On the left, the Virgin Mary, clad in a blue mantle and gold undergarment, is seated and looking upwards with her hand raised. A dove, representing the Holy Spirit, descends towards her from above. On the right, the Angel Gabriel kneels, wearing a green robe and blue and red wings, holding a scroll. Golden rays emanate from a starry blue sky, illuminating the scene. The background features red drapery with gold patterns and architectural elements including arches and windows.
